CustomField.description: Ticked if the number of required documents to be uploaded equals the amount of 'Document'-checkboxes ticked.
CustomField.formula: OR( AND(Number_of_Required_Documents_to_Upload__c = 4, Document_1__c, Document_2__c, Document_3__c, Document_4__c), AND(Number_of_Required_Documents_to_Upload__c = 3, Document_1__c, Document_2__c, Document_3__c), AND(Number_of_Required_Documents_to_Upload__c = 2, Document_1__c, Document_2__c), AND(Number_of_Required_Documents_to_Upload__c = 1, Document_1__c) )
CustomField.label: Ready to Submit
